transcript: Hi, this is Carlos. I stopped taking med for me because it makes me dizzy

key_facts: Patient stopped taking medication due to dizziness
result.recommended_next_step: Pharmacist outreach within 24 hours to address side-effect concern and adherence barrier.
result.safe_patient_reply: Thank you for sharing this information with us. A pharmacist will contact you soon to discuss your medication concerns. If symptoms worsen or you feel unsafe, please seek urgent care.

soap_note.subjective: Patient stopped taking medication due to dizziness
soap_note.plan: Pharmacist to review transcript and follow up with patient.

pharmacist_task.summary: Discuss medication concerns with patient due to side effect.
